rule.regex: User Name:\s+\S+\$\s+|Account Name:\s+\S+\$\s+\.*Logon Type:\s+3\s+|Logon Type:\s+3\.*Account Name:\s+\S+\$\s+|Account Name:\s+DWM-\d+\s+|Account Name:\s+SYSTEM\s+
User Name:\s+\S+\$\s+|Account Name:\s+\S+\$\s+\.*Logon Type:\s+3\s+|Logon Type:\s+3\.*Account Name:\s+\S+\$\s+|Account Name:\s+DWM-\d+\s+|Account Name:\s+SYSTEM\s+
